dialogue: If you even try to take a photo of me, I'll hack into your personal computer and fuck your mom.
What? How will hacking into my computer let you fuck my mother?

No, two separate things. First I'll hack into your personal computer. Probably see if you have any good games, maybe judge you for how well-organized your desktop is. Then, once I'm done, I'll drive over to your mom's house and fuck her.
He must really hate having his photo taken. Or maybe he's just looking for an excuse to hack into a computer and fuck a mom.
